Package org.moera.lib.node.types.body

Class LinkPreview

java.lang.Object
org.moera.lib.node.types.body.LinkPreview
public class LinkPreview extends Object
Represents a preview of a link with various attributes such as site name, URL, title, description, and image hash.

The LinkPreview object maintains a reference to its parent Body and invokes updates to the parent whenever any of its properties are modified.

  • Method Details

    • setParent

      public void setParent(Body parent)
      Sets the parent Body instance for the current LinkPreview. This allows the LinkPreview to reference and notify its parent about modifications when its properties are updated.
      Parameters:
      parent - the Body instance to set as the parent

    • getSiteName

      public String getSiteName()
      Retrieves the name of the site associated with the link preview.
      Returns:
      the site name, or null if the site name is not set

      Parameters:
      siteName - the name of the site to set

      the URL, or null if the URL is not set
